Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities

Class EntitySpawner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.Timer
      • com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.EntitySpawner
  • public abstract class EntitySpawner
extends Timer
    An EntitySpawner is the abstract superclass that should be extended to create an object that spawns a subclass of YaegerEntity. After each interval in ms, set through the constructor, the method spawnEntities() is called, which should be implemented in a subclass.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      EntitySpawner​(long intervalInMs)
      Create a new instance of EntitySpawner for the given interval in milliseconds.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      EntitySupplier getSupplier()
      Return the EntitySupplier that is part of this EntitySpawner.
      void handle​(long now)  
      void onAnimationUpdate​(long timestamp)
      Implement this method, which will be called each animation update with the given interval.
      void setSupplier​(EntitySupplier supplier)  
      protected void spawn​(YaegerEntity entity)
      Spawn an YaegerEntity.
      protected abstract void spawnEntities()
      This method is called after each interval in milleseconds as passed through the constructor of this EntitySpawner.

        Parameters:

      • spawnEntities

        protected abstract void spawnEntities()
        This method is called after each interval in milleseconds as passed through the constructor of this EntitySpawner. It's body should be used for calling spawn(YaegerEntity) with the required instance of YaegerEntity.

      • spawn

        protected void spawn​(YaegerEntity entity)
        Spawn an YaegerEntity. Use this method to add the spawned YaegerEntity to the YaegerScene.
        Parameters:
        entity - The YaegerEntity to be spawned.
